title: Chord: 9th in C# (Shape: C)
content:
# Chord: 9th in C# (Shape: C)

## Brief Presentation
The 9th chord in the key of C# with a C shape plays the notes C#, E#, G#, D#, and F#. This chord provides a rich and complex sound that adds color and texture to music compositions.

## Notes and Intervals
- C# (Root) 
- E# (Major 3rd)
- G# (Perfect 5th)
- D# (Major 9th)
- F# (11th)

## Genre and Flavor
This chord is often used in jazz, funk, R&B, and fusion genres. It has a sophisticated and jazzy flavor that adds tension and depth to the harmonic structure of a piece of music.

## Songs
Here are three songs that feature the 9th chord in C# with a C shape:
1. "Spain" by Chick Corea
2. "Butterfly" by Herbie Hancock
3. "Cissy Strut" by The Meters
